extendedInfo.description: CORE is your portable, expert reference tool for diagnosing musculoskeletal and orthopedic disorders. The Clinical Orthopedic Exam offers you a robust database of over 400 clinical tests with descriptions on how to perform them, video demonstrations, diagnostic properties and links to supporting medical references. Read on to learn why you should download this powerful resource App today! âââââ âCORE has set the standard for a clinical exam app. The most striking feature of this app, in addition to the vast collection of tests and videos, is actually the âpropertiesâ tab. For every test, data is presented regarding the sensitivity, specificity, likelihood ratio, accuracy and other relevant statistical tests based on primary literature references. These lists are incredibly complete. This is a feature that I have not seen replicated by any other orthopaedic reference." - TopOrthoApps.com (Mobile App Reviews for Orthopaedic Surgeons - Featured by AAOS) âââââ âCORE app is a wonderful reference for many clinicians, including, but not limited to, physical therapists, athletic trainers, orthopaedic surgeons, nurses, primary care physicians, and emergency room physicians. The app is user friendly and easy to navigate. The authors have undoubtedly put many hours of work into this application and it shows. I would recommend this to all clinicians who perform orthopedic examinations." - Journal of Orthopaedic & Sports Physical Therapy (JOSPT), April 2011 (Book Reviews) âââââ âCORE is a great addition to the burgeoning collection of medical applications...If their first application is any indication, it seems we will have more to celebrate in the future. ...excellent application for doing the musculoskeletal portion of the physical exam. ....stress how this is a great medical application for primary care physicians. All primary care physicians know how important a strong musculoskeletal physical exam can be, as they are often the first line for presenting symptoms.â - iMedicalApps The physical exam is an important part of the overall evaluation, and maneuvers/special tests are often used to evaluate and diagnose the patient. For almost every musculoskeletal ailment, there is a specific physical maneuver to perform. The results of that test indicate a positive or negative finding, providing a further clue to the diagnosis. Often, there are several tests for each issue. Some are better for diagnosis than others. Thatâs where CORE comes to the rescue. This useful little app contains over 400 medically referenced physical exam maneuvers. All the extremities are covered, as well as the spine. You get step-by-step text and video on how to perform the examination and a quick summary of references for each exam. CORE is the app you need for making your evidence-based, clinical diagnosis. Check out the CORE features: * Powerful pocket reference with periodic updates of emerging research * Over 300 clinical tests to aid in diagnosis for musculoskeletal and orthopedic disorders * Covers tendinous, neuropathic, ligamentous problems for each body part * Descriptions on how to perform each test * Video demonstrations (streaming and with audio) * Diagnostic properties (reliability and validity) * Links to supporting medical references * Reference reviews via abstracts in PUBMed * Free updates when new tests are available in the literature, or new studies with diagnostic properties for old tests are published (No need to âbuy a newer editionâ) * Optimized for phone and tablet!* Please note that STREAMING VIDEO DEMONSTRATION OF CLINICAL TESTS AND PUBMED REFERENCE REVIEW REQUIRE AN ACTIVE NETWORK CONNECTION and have NO AUDIO. There is an in-app purchase option that lets you download all the videos WITH AUDIO to store on your device independent of network connection. Download CORE now, the ultimate pocket reference for musculoskeletal diagnosis.

reviews.title: Good app. Needs updating!
reviews.comment: App content: 4/5.  App aesthetics: 3/5 (vs iOS).
reviews.author: Erik Dufner

reviews.comment: Works great with tablet and phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice Improvement
reviews.comment: Ive used this app intermittently since it was first introduced.  The illustrations are great.  However, for a general orthopedic surgeon, the number of tests is overwhelming.  Some seem very similar and redundant, while others seem obscure.  Perhaps the tests could be ranked by the most commonly performed and clinically relevant in each anatomic area.
reviews.author: Doug Thompson

reviews.title: 5 stars after finally updating
reviews.comment: Awesome with the new update.  I\'m a PT student and this is a great tool .  Works on my galaxy nexus and nexus 7 now.   Invaluable tool for ortho special tests and suck.  Thank u for updating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money.
reviews.comment: Not comprehensive... Tells you that symptom reproduction is a positive test, but not the specific structure that is involved.
reviews.author: Silpa P

reviews.comment: Very helpful app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems with ICS
reviews.comment: Can\'t open individual tests on Galaxy Nexus... Useless... Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Really impressed by this excellent app. Works on my Android 2.3 HTC Desire, so I\'m happy once again.  Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Awesome tech support. Helped me fix a minor issue I was having with my droid X. No compliants!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is fantastic and very useful. The user interface is very simple and intuitive. I love the videos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great reference tool for a student out on clinic who doesn\'t want to haul their textbooks around!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Reference
reviews.comment: This is an extremely useful app...great reference first the clinic and for instructing students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Price is steep but i guess orthopods have to find ways to subsidise their skiing trips to Europe! Great app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app with great tech support. Initially had a display problem on Droid X, but after contacting developer, this was quickly resolved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Frequently forced closed on my LG Optimus Q. I have to reinstall everytime on that occasion. Satisfied with the contents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a very basic app & expensive, but includes excellent videos. I would say its more geared for student & interns.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The app is a good one. I wish there was volume in the video demos. Plus I wish they come up with an interface where the tests are under medical condit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app! Very easy to use with such a wealth of high-quality content, it is a bargain for the price!! Must have for clinicians and students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, and very forthcoming tech support Note that videos are not stored locally. Video issues were resolved by uninstalling and reinstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent for any new or seasoned PT. The literature update makes it the best around.
reviews.author: A Google User
